qas.question: What island is the borough of Brooklyn located on?
Queens is located on what part of Long Island?
The borough of Staten Island is primarily located on what island?

context: New York City is located on one of the world's largest natural harbors, and the boroughs of Manhattan and <a2_0>Staten Island<a2_0/> are (primarily) coterminous with islands of the same names, while Queens and Brooklyn are located at <a1_0>the west end<a1_0/> of the larger <a0_0>Long Island<a0_0/>, and The Bronx is located at the southern tip of New York State's mainland. This situation of boroughs separated by water led to the development of an extensive infrastructure of bridges and tunnels. Nearly all of the city's major bridges and tunnels are notable, and several have broken or set records.
